text: Marianne Muellerleile (born November 26, 1948) is an American actress. She played Norma Bates (2000-2008) in the NBC soap opera Passions. In The Terminator in 1984, she also played a woman with a name similar to Arnold Schwarzenegger's confidant and love interest. Muellerleile was born in St. Louis, Missouri. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri Category:1948 births Category:Living people
title: Marianne Muellerleile
